record.title: ELECTION OF MAJORITY MEMBERS TO CERTAIN STANDING COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, by direction of the Democratic Caucus, I offer a privileged resolution (H. Res. 75) and ask for its immediate consideration.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
record.narrative: The Clerk continued to read the resolution.
